name: Private Photography Tours
description:
Private photography tours are customized to your skill level and favourite subjects.
A perfect match to your busy schedule.
Ideal for for learning a specific photographic technique or just indulging in a truly unique experience of Vancouver city and surrounding areas.

Do you love long exposures and want to learn how to get those blurred water images?

Are you looking to improve your candid street photography people shots?

Fascinated by buildings and bridges and looking to get better photos of them?

New to your camera or photography and hoping to build your confidence with your settings?

Ready to challenge yourself creatively and add more impact and story telling to your photography?

Excited by the incredible forests, nature, mountains and seascapes?

As an individual or small group, you get to choose the kind of photography tour that works best for you!  We customize the location(s) and area of photographic focus to your skill level and visual interest.  This beautiful city is so diverse, you choose your passion!

From total newbie photographer to experienced enthusiast, hobbyist to professional, we have local photography experts who are experienced in helping all levels of photographer improve their technical and creative skills!

On vacation is the perfect time to improve your confidence with your camera – you are relaxed, able to practice a lot, and exposed to all kinds of new visual interests.
